linux.synopsis: A Lite Lisk Client to securely connect to the Lisk network and manage your lisk assets.

releases.name: Hot fix for Lisk 0.5.0
releases.body: This is a hot fix for compatibility with Lisk network 0.5.0.

Basically this is a version with the translactions added. A few fixes have been also made
- translations French, Arab, German, Italian, and Spanish
- fix issue checking for transactions on nodes running lisk >= 0.3.2
- changed background
- added add delegate by name in the vote tab
- fixed color issue when lisk exchange rate direction is different in Fiat and BTC

releases.name: version 1.0.0
releases.body:
Official release, bug fixes of 1.0.0 beta.3
- windows install is removed, only a zip file is provided. This remove the issue of the scary alert popup.
- fixed issue sending lisk
- known issues: popup menu for copy-paste does not work for some reason on ubuntu and windows. use ctrl+c ctrl+v as a workaround

releases.name: 1.0.0 Beta 3
releases.body:
**_Thanks to our sponsors, please visit http://desktop.lisk-wallet.com/sponsors.html and make sure to vote their delegates to support development**_
- added sponsor page link to first page
- various fixes
- navigate into any account from the transaction history
- moved "send lisk" button to account window
- right click to pop up menu for copy/paste
- world clocks widget to first page
- added balance summary of all your owned account

releases.name: 1.0.0 Beta 2
releases.body:
- Added changer.com API to buy and sell LSK with altcoin and USD
- Various bug fixes.

releases.name: 1.0.0 Beta 1
releases.body:
- frameless windows, draggable and movable.
- installation files (yes, signed macosx version!)
- managed your accounts
- pick random mainnet peer, looking in good health.

releases.name: 1.0.0 Alpha 3
releases.body:
New features
- Change currency
- Virtual Folders to manage different subaccounts, no need to pay a fee for transactions
- Added a transaction validation before actually sending it.

Various bug fixes

releases.name: 1.0.0 Alpha 2
releases.body:
Some improvements:
- Dashboard UI is cleaner
- Added network connectivity service and realtime price from coinmarketcap.com
- Possible to label account.
- Copy/Paste address easier.
- Fixed scrolling issue

releases.name: 1.0.0 alpha 1
releases.body:
First alpha release
- linux, darwin, win versions
- view accounts, transactions, votes, delegate statistics
- send lisk (supporting second passphrase)
- remove account
- connecting to https://login.lisk.io node
